question: Which line is printed as the last line of output?

answers.text: value of n after the loop is -1.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: During the loop's execution, only the statements in the body will be executed. When loop terminates the first statement after the loop will run.

answers.text: value of n after the loop is 0.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: The loop terminates when n = 0, therefore the value of n after the loop's execution is not equal to -1.

answers.text: value of n after the loop is 1.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: The loop's termination condition is n = 0; therefore, the value of n after the loop equals 0. The last printed line will be: value of n after the loop is 0.

detailedSolution: The loop's termination condition is n = 0; therefore, the value of n after the loop equals 0. The last printed line will be: value of n after the loop is 0.
